hints.content: The $\goldD{A}$ is at $\redD2{:}{\blueE{30}}$ because it is located $\blueE{30}$ ticks after $\redD2{:}{00}$.

On a clock, $\redD2{:}{00} $ looks like this:

![A clock shows the short hour hand points to 2. The long minute hand points to 12. Labels outside the edge of the clock are number 1 through 12.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/98c8c86e8c3342945fbf1f5269fd4411d01a089c)

And just like on the number line, $2{:}{\blueE{30}}$ is $\blueE{30}$ ticks after $2{:}{00}.$

![A clock shows the short hour hand is between 2 and 3. The long minute hand points to 6. Outside the edge of the clock 12 is labeled 0, 1 is labeled 5, 2 is labeled 10, and so on with 11 labeled 55. ](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/272af60fa75a649dd56b8eb2f67c633d46ce2bad)

This clock shows $2{:}{30}$.

![A clock shows the short hour hand is between 2 and 3. The long minute hand points to 6.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/c9324e1eef6384e6ae85b47ec7def7165f61163d)

question.content:
**Which clock matches the time shown on the number line?**

![The number line goes from 2:00 to 3:00. Every 15 minutes there are labels at 2:15, 2:30, and 2:45. Point A is labeled at 2:30.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/61797a38c46248140c8b6610e724508877f0b9c9)

[[â˜ƒ radio 1]]

choices.content: ![A clock shows the short hour points halfway between 1 and 2. The long minute hand points to 6.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/5d712c6e44003629c0d0bcde07f77b01fe79f4d3)
![A clock shows the short hour hand points to 2. The long minute hand points to 3.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/0aedc888f462f43f2aa838eb6e87182a0f249ece)
![A clock shows the short hour hand is between 2 and 3. The long minute hand points to 6.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/c9324e1eef6384e6ae85b47ec7def7165f61163d)
